name: Laundry Rush
description:
Pick up the dirty laundry and clean it as soon as possible
The more you upgrade your dry cleaning shop, the more customers you will have
Will you manage these laundry chaos?
developers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
